review.title: “Responsible for overall management of the company and acting as the principal advisor on proposals for services.”
review.pros: Pros – Self employment with freedom to have creative management.
review.cons: Cons – Small dimension of the market.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Founded the company, from a business plan approved by the institute of employment, established a number of partnerships and representations from manufacturers and distributors of hardware and software enabling to develop a consistent offer on the market that led to the creation of a portfolio of clients that determined the growth of the company.
